author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HELENE ALMOST A MAJOR HURRICANE WITH ADDITIONAL STRENGTHENING  FORECAST BEFORE LANDFALL IN THE FLORIDA BIG BEND... ...PREPARATIONS TO PROTECT LIFE AND PROPERTY SHOULD BE RUSHED TO COMPLETION...
summary:
...HELENE ALMOST A MAJOR HURRICANE WITH ADDITIONAL STRENGTHENING  FORECAST BEFORE LANDFALL IN THE FLORIDA BIG BEND... ...PREPARATIONS TO PROTECT LIFE AND PROPERTY SHOULD BE RUSHED TO COMPLETION...
 As of 1:00 PM CDT Thu Sep 26
 the center of Helene was located near 26.4, -85.0
 with movement NNE at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 959 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 110 mph.
